title: Streets Data -Historical Pavement Condition Index (PCI) Scores
description: Historical Pavement Condition Index (PCI) Scores by location.

columns.name: CNN
columns.description: CNN of street segment or intersection location

columns.name: Street_Name
columns.description: Street name

columns.name: From_Street
columns.description: Paving Condition Index Score

columns.name: To_Street
columns.description: Cross street 1

columns.name: PCI_Score
columns.description: Cross street 2

columns.name: PCI_Change_Date
columns.description: Date condition score last updated

columns.name: Treatment_or_Survey
columns.description: Treatment or Survey

columns.name: Street_Accepted_For_Maintenance
columns.description: Street accepted for maintenance by Public Works

columns.name: Functional_Class
columns.description: The functional class of the street segment:  Arterial, Collector or Residential.

columns.name: X
columns.description: A coordinate whose value is determined by measuring parallel to an x-axis.  CA State Plane III.

columns.name: Y
columns.description: A coordinate whose value is determined by measuring parallel to a y-axis.  CA State Plane III.

columns.name: Latitude
columns.description: A geographic coordinate expressed in decimal degrees that specifies the north-south position of a point on the Earth's surface and assuming a WGS84 coordinate system.

columns.name: Longitude
columns.description: A geographic coordinate expressed in decimal degrees that specifies the east-west position of a point on the Earth's surface and assuming a WGS84 coordinate system.

columns.name: Line
columns.description: Represents vector geometry objects on a map

columns.name: Point
columns.description: Represents vector geometry objects on a map

columns.name: Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Neighborhoods' (jwn9-ihcz) the point in column 'point' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: SF Find Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'SF Find Neighborhoods' (6qbp-sg9q) the point in column 'point' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Current Police Districts
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Current Police Districts' (qgnn-b9vv) the point in column 'point' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Current Supervisor Districts
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Current Supervisor Districts' (26cr-cadq) the point in column 'point' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Analysis Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Analysis Neighborhoods' (ajp5-b2md) the point in column 'point' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

whom_it_may_interest: This dataset may be of interest to city planners, transportation departments, and utility companies to assess the pavement conditions over time and across different parts of the city.
